title: RBI asks banks, NBFCs to share key facts on loans with all retail, MSME borrowers
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has requested banks and NBFCs to provide borrowers from retail and micro and small enterprises with a key fact statement (KFS) detailing loan agreement information, including all-in-cost. The move aims to increase transparency and disclosure in loan pricing by regulated entities.
